related_questions.question: Is Autodesk getting rid of resellers?
related_questions.snippet: Autodesk (ADSK), in a move to seize back margin and business from its outsourced distribution channel, took back control of transactions from its resellers and changed the billing intervals on which its software products could be resold in 2023.

related_questions.question: Who is the largest reseller of Autodesk?
related_questions.snippet: Graitec is one of Autodesk's largest resellers in the world, since 1997 and Platinum Autodesk Partner in Europe, USA and Canada.

related_questions.question: What are the tiers of Autodesk partner?
related_questions.snippet: The program is divided into three tiers: Reseller, Gold, and Platinum, with each level reflecting the partner's investment in technical expertise and customer support capabilities.

related_questions.question: How do I change my reseller in my Autodesk account?
related_questions.snippet: Sign into your Autodesk account at manage.autodesk.com and click Billing and Orders > Subscriptions and Contracts. Select a subscription. From the Actions drop-down menu, select Update Reseller Information. Enter the new partner account number and click Find.
